text: 8 miles from home
when my older brother told me he was coming to thailand straight away i knew what i wanted to do
omar loves to arrange like epic holidays
so the few days that he spent with us had to be memorable
we did the pick up truck already so to step it up we rented some big bikes and hit the road
we went out for some nice meals
went to some of chiang mais most popular temples
its weird isn't it?
we like to think that we showed them chiang mai in style
the sun was out, the air was cooler than usual,
it was perfect riding conditions
we took them to mae ya waterfall
and the ride there was really twisty so we had some fun leaning into the curves
Doi inthanon was next up the highest point in thailand
bikes made it up there no problem
it was pretty cold up there
rolling!
after that the time just melted away
omar and the guys went on a 2 day adventure tour
they done ziplining in the jungle
and they done some white water rafting
on the last night everyone piled into our house
having the 2 extra bedrooms came in handy
those short few days i spent with my brother felt like minutes

it's good that we could see each other
out here

hopefully this trip will be
remembered for a long time
